description.displayText: Chanda is amazing! She babysits for our 2 and 4 year old daughters. She is patient, caring, creative (so many art projects!) and a much-needed calming presence. Our daughters both love her. We live in an area where parking can be difficult but she's very conscientious about being on time and always leaves early to make sure she has time to park. She helped our older daughter with virtual school and pretty much kept us sane during the period our pre-k daughter was in virtual school.
description.originalText: Chanda is amazing! She babysits for our 2 and 4 year old daughters. She is patient, caring, creative (so many art projects!) and a much-needed calming presence. Our daughters both love her. We live in an area where parking can be difficult but she's very conscientious about being on time and always leaves early to make sure she has time to park. description.displayText:
Chanda works with children professionally - and it shows! She  cared for my foster son for five months during the COVID-19 pandemic when day cares were closed. She was incredibly mindful of good health and hygiene practices and I felt very comfortable having her in our home from a health and safety perspective. 

My son adores her and has been especially helpful in working with my toddler on word acquisition and fun arts and craft activities.

description.displayText:
We love Lachanda. She is great with my son. She is reliable, dependable and My son loves her. He is always asking for her. She has great conversations with him and just great with kids all around. 

A must hire!
description.originalText:
We love Lachanda. She is great with my son. She is reliable, dependable and My son loves her. He is always asking for her. She has great conversations with him and just great with kids all around. 

A must hire!

description.displayText: Chanda is an amazing babysitter. She is dependable, dedicated, accomodating with schedule changes, and loves children. She has been babysitting my six-year-old daughter for about a year and we all absolutely love her. I wish I could bring her with us when we move; we are moving out of state. She is fantastic!
description.originalText: Chanda is an amazing babysitter. She is dependable, dedicated, accomodating with schedule changes, and loves children. She has been babysitting my six-year-old daughter for about a year and we all absolutely love her. I wish I could bring her with us when we move; we are moving out of state. She is fantastic!

description.displayText: Chanda has been my "go-to" babysitter for several years.  I'd hire her again in a heartbeat.  She's respectful, patient, kind, dedicated and loving.  She's been focused on her education for some time and I've admired her spirit and determination over the years. I trust her implicitly with my son.
description.originalText: Chanda has been my "go-to" babysitter for several years.  I'd hire her again in a heartbeat.  She's respectful, patient, kind, dedicated and loving.  She's been focused on her education for some time and I've admired her spirit and determination over the years. I trust her implicitly with my son.

description.displayText:
I knew Chanda  for 3-4 years,  she babysat for    four of my children. Chanda, unlike her peers  has remained strong and focused. She has dedicated herself completely in school. in spite of her life-stresses she remains fun-loving person whom is an absolute pleasure to be around. Even at the age 18, Chanda is extraordinarily dependable and responsible. Chanda's desire and ability to learn new things give promise and confidence that this young lady will excel at anything she puts her mind to; her strong spiritual beliefs has and will continue to aid in keeping her grounded in the process.

To sum it all up,  what you see with Chanda is basically what you get. Her honesty, kindness, and gentle personality will indeed make you proud that you   have crossed her path.

description.displayText: Chanda W. was a blessing to my family. She was very reliable and helpful. My kids loved her and learned so much from her. If I still lived in New York she would still bey care provider.
description.originalText: Chanda W. was a blessing to my family. She was very reliable and helpful. My kids loved her and learned so much from her. If I still lived in New York she would still bey care provider.

description.displayText:
I knew Chanda Williams for 3-4 years she babysit for me, watching four of my
children. Chanda , unlike her peers, has remained strong and focused enough
not to succumb to the lures of alcohol and drugs. Instead she has dedicated
herself completely in school. in spite of her life-stresses she remains
fun-loving person whom is an absolute pleasure to be around. Even at the
age 18, Chanda is extraordinarily dependable and responsible. Chanda's
desire and ability to learn new things give promise and confidence that
this young lady will excel at anything she puts her mind to; her strong
spiritual beliefs has and will continue to aid in keeping her grounded in
the process.

To sum it all up, and at the sake of the old cliche', " To know her is to
love her". What you see with Chanda is basically what you get. Her honesty,
kindness, and gentle personality will indeed make you proud that you too,
have crossed her path.
